GSD.description:
ext4: add EXT4_IGET_BAD flag to prevent unexpected bad inode

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.18 by commit f725b290ed79ad61e4f721fee95a287892d8b1ad. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ext4: add EXT4_IGET_BAD flag to prevent unexpected bad inode
